snippet.title: Fumiko! - Steam Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Fumiko! is coming on Valentine's Day! Mark 14.02.2017 in your calendar.

Download the free preview level here: http://www.indiedb.com/games/fumiko-the-game/downloads

Software to make Fumiko! The Game:

OS: Linux (currently Linux Mint 17 and Fedora 23)
Engine: Unity3d
3D Editor: Blender
2D Editor: GIMP & Krita
Audio Editor: Audacity & FL Studio
Video Editor: OpenShot
Recording: Simple Screen Recorder
Coding IDE: Vim + Vim Plugins + Terminator
Project Planning: Kanboard
Bug Tracking: Mantis

++++++++++++++++++
See you here:

https://twitter.com/FumikoTheGame
http://www.indiedb.com/games/fumiko-the-game
https://www.fumiko-game.com
